to_pandas¶

ObjectIndex.to_pandas()¶

Converts the ObjectIndex to a pandas Index object.

Returns¶

pd.Index

A pandas Index object.

Examples¶

>>> idx = ObjectIndex(['a', 'b', 'c'])
>>> idx.to_pandas()
Index(['a', 'b', 'c'], dtype='object')
